about_the_game:
Lio was just a regular college student, until one day he found himself in a twisted alternative reality without any memories.
Break the fourth wall and collaborate with him to find out his story.




With almost 2 years of active development on his back, "LIO" aims to stand out as unique experience by using multiple artstyles and forms of gameplay.
Play and solve riddles across full 3D and isometric-2D sequences, all while uncovering Lio's story across 2D-pixel art and 3D cutscenes.




Along with multiple ways of exploring the videogame medium, "LIO" also puts together the work of 11 different musical and SFX artists, while also featuring 3 vocal perfomances.
The soundtrack will surely get you caught in a unique atmosphere.




Reaching "the end" means nothing, or pehaps it does?
With two main endings and 3 small sub-endings, those with an high enough attention span will be able to play from 3 to 6 hours before the full story is unravelled. (Not including the easter eggs... hehehehe).




"LIO" is a completely free game developed by a single person with the only intent of sharing passion for this incredible entertainment medium we all love and to celebrate creative endeavor without caring too much about nowadays standards.
It's simple, very authorial and without too many premises, but i still hope you'll love it as much as i do!

Created by Fili - In loving memory and dedicated to S.B. (1968 - 2022)

highlighted.name: La Prima Volta Non Si Scorda Mai

content_descriptors.notes: Stylized representations of blood, allusions & stylized representations to/of psychotropic drugs, indirect representations & allusions to self harm (sound only), indirect representations of violent acts (sound only).

name: LIO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4370 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Unravel the story of a boy who wakes up in a mysterious world without any memories.
